name: EMODnet Physics
description: EMODnet Physics catalogs oceanographic data from key European and global repositories, providing a comprehensive entry point to in-situ ocean physics observations such as sea temperature, salinity, currents, waves, sea level, and other parameters. Data is aggregated, interoperable, and downloadable in multiple formats.
owner_name: European Marine Observation and Data Network (EMODnet)
owner_subregion_iso3166_2: EMODnet covers pan-European and global regions
